name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DFM Engineer with a solid 8 years of experience in designing manufacturable parts with a keen focus on CNC, 3D CAD, and **SolidWorks**. I excel in applying design for manufacturability (DFM) principles alongside detailed knowledge in GD&T and material selection to optimize production processes effectively. My practical expertise spans across various fabrication techniques, including **3D printing**, milling, turning, EDM, grinding, honing, lapping, along with welding and stamping. 
Known for my strong communication and collaboration skills, I foster a customer-focused environment while leveraging adaptability and problem-solving abilities to address unique engineering challenges. My proven track record includes enhancing manufacturability in complex designs, ultimately driving project success in dynamic team settings.
